question: How do I sign up?
answer: Signing up is simple! Click the Sign Up button, fill in your details, and verify your email to get started.

question: What types of tasks can I do?
answer: You can complete regular tasks and, depending on your subscription plan, special tasks to earn more money.

question: How do I earn money?
answer: Pick a task from the available list, complete it according to the instructions, and your earnings will be added to your account.

question: Can I change my subscription plan?
answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime from your account settings.

question: Is there a monthly limit on tasks?
answer: Yes, each subscription plan has a monthly task limit for regular and special tasks. Check your plan details for exact numbers.

question: How do I get support?
answer: You can reach out to our support team via the Help section in your account or by emailing support@example.com.
